txt.en: Balanced Attacks grant the buff 'Innate Strength: Clever Technique', increasing the Brawlerâ€™s Finesse Rating.\n\nIf a Balanced Attack is performed while 'Innate Strength: Clever Technique' is still active, the buff is instead advanced to a higher tier, to a maximum of Tier 4.

Tier 1: Modest Finesse Rating Bonus
Tier 2: Minor Finesse Rating Bonus
Tier 3: Finesse Rating Bonus
Tier 4: Greater Finesse Rating Bonus
